sentences.english: When you've fastened the boards, tie the strings off so that they don't slip.
sentences.chinese: 木板釘牢後，把繩子打結繫緊，免得鬆脫。

sentences.english: Knot tying is vital in rock climbing.
sentences.chinese: 打結在攀巖運動中是至關重要的。

sentences.english: Unusual fruit bowl made from a flat sheet of steel which is then warped and knotted into itself.
sentences.chinese: 由鋼片扭曲打結制成的獨特果盤。

sentences.english: I constantly found myself tongue-tied when it came to seeing guests off at the door.
sentences.chinese: 作爲美國人，每當要我送客出門時，我總是舌頭打結。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the hook strength and the knot strength of aramid fiber are also introduced.
sentences.chinese: 同時，對芳綸的抗鉤接強度和抗打結強度也作了簡介。

sentences.english: I've seen this knot described slightly differently in various knotting books.
sentences.chinese: 我看過本節描述略有不同的各種打結的書籍。

sentences.english: If bumps into ties a knot undergoes the evil, best leads him to watch the specialized nursing human affairs.
sentences.chinese: 如果碰到打結非常歷害，最好帶他去看專業護理人事。

sentences.english: "V" type knot device and pleurodesis are safe in VATS.
sentences.chinese: 型打結器及胸膜固定術在胸腔鏡手術中安全可靠。

sentences.english: I got stage-fright and became tongue-tied.
sentences.chinese: 我一上臺就緊張，舌頭也開始打結。

sentences.english: It causes knotting which is not at all easy to untangle.
sentences.chinese: 它起因打結這是很不容易理清。

sentences.english: You want everyone to think that you’re fine, and your stomach is in a knot.
sentences.chinese: 你想讓所有人認爲自己沒事，而你自己的胃卻在打結。

sentences.english: This wire is too stiff to knot easily.
This cool towel does not employ the use of any fastener.
sentences.chinese: 這條超酷的毛巾不用打結就能穿。

sentences.english: The furnace lining of diathermanous inductor adopts entirely knot type.
sentences.chinese: 本透熱感應器的爐襯採用的是整體打結式。

sentences.english: It cannot be knotted to a piece of gros grain.
sentences.chinese: 它不能在打結的羅緞一塊。
